title: The Case of the Candy Cane Clue
description: Ashley's Detective Notebook There is only one Singalong Sammy doll left on Earth -- and it's missing Sammy was stolen during Patty's slumber party at a really cool toy store -- Toy World. Now everyone at the party is a suspect -- including us Mary-Kate and I have to find the real crook before morning -- or everyone at Patty's party is in big touble
author: Judy Katschke
